#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main(){
	string a,b;
	while(1){
		cin>>a>>b;
		if(a=="0" && b=="0"){
			break;
		}
		int ans=0,curr=0,j=(a.length()-1),k=(b.length()-1);
//		cout<<"initial j="<<j<<" initial k= "<<k<<endl;
		for(int i=max((a.length()-1),(b.length()-1));i>=0;i--){
			if(j>=0 && k>=0){
			curr=(a[j]+b[k]-96+curr);
			
		}
			else if(j>=0){
				curr=(a[j]+curr-48);
			}
			else{
				curr=(b[k]+curr-48);
			}
//			cout<<"curr ="<<curr<<endl;
			if(curr>9){
				ans++;
				curr=1;
			}
			else{
				curr=0;
			}
			j--;
			k--;
		}
		if(ans==0)
		printf("No carry operation.\n");
		else if(ans==1)
		printf("%d carry operation.\n",ans);
		else
		printf("%d carry operations.\n",ans);
	}
	return 0;
}
